SEARCH
Package it.polimi.is23am10.server.model.factory

Class SharedPatternFactory

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.is23am10.server.model.factory.SharedPatternFactory
public final class SharedPatternFactory extends Object
Shared pattern factory object.

NOTE: if not specified, each iteration of the player's bookshelf inside the functions is gonna be first over rows,then columns

    #10 in rulebook, #6 in images Rule that checks if there are at least two rows full of different types of tiles.

    • getNotUsedPattern

      public static SharedPattern<Predicate<Bookshelf>> getNotUsedPattern(List<SharedPattern<Predicate<Bookshelf>>> usedPatterns)
      Method used to get random SharedPattern between the 12 possible.
      Parameters:
      usedPatterns - a List of SharedPattern storing the already used patterns.
      Returns:
